title: (Solved) I'm not able to reply to some boards
body:
I created this account for the roleplay boards, made it level 5 and tried to submit my request at the board.
The reply box is blocked, the only thing on it being "must be level 5 or higher to reply" or something like that. I went to another board and at another board (don't ask me which one tho), the message switched to "blablabla level 7 blablabla"
Then I leveled the account to 7, but at the roleplay boards i still get the "blabla 5 blabla" message. I'm kinda pissed.

replies.body: Oh looks like it's working now. Thank you!
It looks like this is your first post, so your account may have needed to sync to the boards.  Everything looks sync'd so you should be able to post there now.
